LanguageData.Asexual.degreeDatas.0.label: asexual (aro)
LanguageData.Asexual.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is uninterested in sexual or romantic engagements.
LanguageData.Bisexual.degreeDatas.0.label: bisexual
LanguageData.Bisexual.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people regardless of gender.
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.label: gay
LanguageData.Gay.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people of {PAWN_possessive} own gender.
LanguageData.Straight.degreeDatas.0.label: straight
LanguageData.Straight.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is romantically and sexually attracted to people of the opposite gender.
LanguageData.Faithful.degreeDatas.0.label: faithful
LanguageData.Faithful.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
LanguageData.Philanderer.degreeDatas.0.label: philanderer
LanguageData.Philanderer.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef} just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
